titles.title: Commending the South Carolina Aquarium in Charleston for its outstanding Sea Turtle Care Center and its dedicated efforts in rehabilitating and releasing injured and sick sea turtles, ensuring their return to their natural environment.

Commending the South Carolina Aquarium in Charleston for its outstanding Sea Turtle Care Center and its dedicated efforts in rehabilitating and releasing injured and sick sea turtles, ensuring their return to their natural environment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This resolution commends the South Carolina Aquarium in Charleston for its Sea Turtle Care Center and its contributions to the rehabilitation and release of injured and sick sea turtles.
